Package xyz.rk0cc.willpub.cmd

package xyz.rk0cc.willpub.cmd
A java package that handles needs for executing pub commands.
Since:
1.0.0
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    xyz.rk0cc.willpub.cmd.annotation
    Annotate Class in pub command package and it's subpackages to give special operation.
    xyz.rk0cc.willpub.cmd.options
    Contains pub subcommand or global option with feature.
    xyz.rk0cc.willpub.cmd.subcmd
    Provides all supported pub subcommands except pub global which do nothing when execute it on JVM.
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    PubCommandProcessFactory
    A factory that build Process that running PubSubCommand to local machine.
